articles.author: Mathieu Pollet
articles.title: US in ‘direct contact’ with Syria rebels, Blinken says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: This is the first public confirmation of interaction with Hayat Tahrir al-Sham, the terrorist-designated group that ousted Assad.
articles.content:
The first public confirmation of interaction with HTS came at the conclusion of Blinken’s diplomatic tour of the region sparked by the sudden downfall of Assad’s decades-long rule.
He signed off on … [+1342 chars]
